name: A UserStyles.org Darkly
description:
Multiple Dark themes for UserStyles.org.

See Advanced Style Settings to select the color theme. Feel free to Preview a theme before selecting one.

Screenshots:

  • Obsidian (Shown above)
  • Monokai
  • Blue
  • Black
additional_info:
Change Log:
  • 2019-06-07: Small changes
  • 2018-12-01: Updated for latest, horrid USO updates
  • 2018-06-30: Hide android spam. Small fixes.
  • v1.1 (2018-02-21): Fixed: Various link colors, some boxes, etc.
  • v1.0: Fixed: Icon colors, Selection colors, some forum options (send message), New/Edit Page (settings textboxes)
  • v0.1: Initial release with 4 themes: Obsidian, Monokai, Blue, and Black.

discussions.name: Needs an update - its all gone white BG
